attributes.action: Do not re-open schools until corona vaccine is introduced and made public.
attributes.additional_details: The Government is planning to re-open Primary and Secondary schools for limited students, this should not be done as corona is still at large, opening schools discourages social distancing and could very well lead to a 2nd peak.
attributes.background: The Government should not re-open schools until the vaccine for corona is introduced as this is the safest option. Parents across the UK are not comfortable too send their students back to school.
